org.nzdis.micro.messaging.network.netty

Class UnsentMessagePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<Message,java.lang.String>
        • org.nzdis.micro.messaging.network.netty.UnsentMessagePool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Message,java.lang.String>

    public class UnsentMessagePool
extends java.util.HashMap<Message,java.lang.String>
    UnsentMessagePool holds all unsent (not successfully sent) messages for later analysis. To be enhanced with more specific strategies on automatic handling.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $ $Date: 2010/11/14 00:00:00 $
    Author:
    Christopher Frantz
    See Also:
